statements: SELECT * FROM crm_marketing_integration;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE crm_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crm_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_marketing_integration ORDER BY crm_id DESC;
SELECT crm_id, customer_name, email FROM crm_marketing_integration
SELECT * FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE marketing_campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT crm_id, customer_name, last_interaction_date FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name FROM crm_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM marketing_data WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_data WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM crm_data JOIN marketing_data ON crm_data.customer_id = marketing_data.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id AS ID, customer_name AS Name, customer_email AS Email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, status FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM crm_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM crm_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, message, timestamp FROM crm_data JOIN communication_logs ON crm_data.customer_id = communication_logs.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, status FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT message, timestamp, communication_type FROM communication_logs WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.total_amount > p.price ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM crm_customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_contacts ORDER BY contact_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT lead_source, lead_status, lead_score FROM marketing_leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM crm_customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT lead_source, lead_status, lead_score FROM marketing_leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
